channel.title: I doubt it, but, anyone know about statuses?
channel.description: Im looking for a tutorial, or a guide on how to set up a status image for a server, it has to do with the server sending a message to a mysql datebase, and it changes a image based on the status, but, not sure how to do, so, anyone want to help me?
